full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LHA MO GTAD DKAR 'GRO BZANG MA'I SGRUB MCHOG DANG 'BREL BA'I DUS MCHOD BYA TSUL PHYUGS GA-YANG 'GUG BYED DON YOD LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017A *, ,(CES LHA MO GTAD DKAR 'GRO BZANG MA'I SGRUB MCHOG DANG 'BREL BA'I DUS MCHOD BYA TSUL PHYUGS GA-YANG 'GUG BYED DON YOD LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SGRUB THABS RIN 'BYUNG DANG, ,BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS DBANG PO MDZAD PA'I GTAD DKAR 'GRO BZANG MA'I GTOR CHOG SOGS LA GZHIR BYAS TE, GO SLA ZHING 'KHYER BDE BAR BLO BZANG LHUN GRUB MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG 'BYUNG GNAS SO,, ,,'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA MA LUS PA NGES PAR PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG LHUN GRUB MING CAN,
